PillPack - iOS, full stack (rails-angular), marketing analyst, Platform Engineer, Director of Acquisition and Analytics, Director of Marketing Communications, Email Marketing Specialist.

At PillPack we are on a mission to reinvent pharmacy. We are using technology, design, and a healthy dose of empathy to change the way people think about medicine. Our company is a mixture of healthcare, design, and technology obsessives and we expect you to be pretty enthralled with at least one of those.
